data.name: Maria Hill
data.description: Maria Hill is the Secret Avengers' Support who backs up her allies by calling in S.H.I.E.L.D. care packages and special agents to take out high priority targets.

starItems.name: Maria Hill
starItems.description: Maria Hill is the Secret Avengers' Support who backs up her allies by calling in S.H.I.E.L.D. care packages and special agents to take out high priority targets.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary target
Always apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured ally.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to the most injured non-summoned ally. If that ally is a <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color>, they also gain <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

1.description:
Summon <color=#86e619>1</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Trooper.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to the summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Trooper.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Gain assist from all S.H.I.E.L.D. Trooper allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

If Sharon Carter is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>+500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
Summon <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target

2.description:
Summon <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.
Gain assist from all S.H.I.E.L.D. Trooper allies.
Apply <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> to primary target.

If Sharon Carter is an ally, gain <color=#86e619>+500%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

This attack is unavoidable and cannot be Blocked.

3.description:

Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers.

Summon <color=#86e619>2</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers.

6.nextUpgrade:
Summon <color=#86e619>3</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target

7.description:
Summon <color=#86e619>3</color> S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers.
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to summoned S.H.I.E.L.D. Troopers.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>5%</color> Healing for <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies
Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this characters Max Health

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health + Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health + Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> of this character's Max Health + Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>30%</color> of this character's Max Health + Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>15%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health + Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage to all enemies
Clear all negative effects from self, <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies

7.description:
Clear all negative effects from self and all <color=#fff568>AVENGER</color> and <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies.
Apply +<color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>, and <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
Heal self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>35%</color> of this character's Max Health + Heal all non-<color=#fff568>SKILL</color> allies by <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

1.description:
On self or any ally Block, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to heal the most injured ally by <color=#86e619>5%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional <color=#86e619>5%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>15%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies

2.description:

3.description:

3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies

4.description:
On self or any ally Block, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to heal the most injured ally by <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, this always occurs.

Gain +<color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional <color=#86e619>40%</color> Resistance for self and all <color=#fff568>SECRET AVENGER</color> allies.
